alert.note: Alert for Morgan County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 27 at 11:56AM MDT until March 27 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow ongoing over eastern Weld and Morgan counties. Storm total snow accumulation 5 to 10 inches, with the heaviest totals north and northwest of Fort Morgan. * WHERE...Briggsdale, and Fort Morgan. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions due to heavy falling snow and some blowing and drifting snow. Visibilities will be reduced to less than one quarter mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
